title: (x) Eyes Open - FF Dynamoe {Rainer}
content:
Must be obvious for most of you…

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [typo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100905061739/http:/typophile.com/files/typo_1.jpg) | 7.73 KB |
author: gberry

comments.content:
Thank you very much.  
Sounds so obvious…  
Need some training.

Well actually this is FF Dynamoe Hard (the inversed Dynamoe) but I haven't found a reference.

Oh, and you are certainly welcome … :-D
Our reference is the Snow Patrol music band identity.

I'm not familiar with Dynamoe Hard, but here's a link to [FF Dyanamoe](http://web.archive.org/web/20100905061739/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.2961.2.8&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=eyes+open&sampleSize=48), which you could easily inverse yourself.

Well, Stephen, it should be a FontFont-typeface (therefore available at Fontshop, because our printer-description-file has the typical FF-icon on it). But we bought it in the 90ies, maybe it's not available anymore, ...

I think there have been a number of freebie homemade fonts based on scans of Dymo labeling. I suspect you could find some at Dafont, or other font sites.

- Mike Yanega

I hope the picture upload works...

This is an image of Dynamoe Hard. copyright Just v. Rossum, Leterror, 1991

[Dynamoe Hard](http://web.archive.org/web/20100905061739/http:/static.flickr.com/76/187377117_7a16a3c885.jpg)
FSI has no record of that style of Dynamoe, so it looks like an unauthorized modification.
